price: Wafuateni ambao hawakutakini ujira, hali ya kuwa wenyewe wameongoka.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: Wafuateni watu wasio taka kwenu ujira wowote kwa kukunasihini na kukuongozeni, na hali wao wenyewe wameongoka, na nyinyi mtapata manufaa kwa kufuata njia ya kheri na mafanikio!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
